EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Pivotal Analytics Day_KC_Q317.FieldMktg2017_Reminder_No_Tech_Requi
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Analytics Day Kansas City | Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you at the Pivotal Analytics Day, hosted by Pivotal in Kansas City. As a reminder, this will be a full, fun day to learn about patterns and technology. We’ll take care of breakfast and lunch, so don’t worry about packing anything! Please bring your laptop for the hands-on workshop. Windows students will need an SSH program installed such as MobaXterm. MacOS students can use the standard terminal application.
Date: Thursday, September 21, 2017
Time:
8:00AM to 5:15PM
Location: Sprint Accelerator 210 W 19th Terrace Kansas City, MO 64108 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/210+W+19+Terrace,+Kansas+City,+MO+64108/@39.090328,-94.586786,14z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x87c0f04161cb0517:0x2b238264ef40b0a9!8m2!3d39.0903282!4d-94.5867859?hl=en]]>)
{{my.Pivotal Analytics Day Kansas City:default=edit me}}
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email Alex at aewy@pivotal.io <[[mailto:aewy@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
Alex Ewy and The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Pivotal-Analytics-Day-Kansas-City.html]]>
